text: O vy, kto veruyet! Ved' mnogobozhniki, poistine, nechisty. I pust' oni ne priblizhayutsya teper' K Zapretnoy (dlya grekha) Mecheti, Kogda minuyet etot god. A yesli bednost' vas pugayet - Obogatit vas ot shchedrot Svoikh Allakh, Yesli na to Yego zhelan'ye budet, - Poistine, vseznayushch On i mudr
